about_the_game:
MARSBOUND is a survival game which combines elements of economic strategy and psychological thriller. The player assumes the role of an AI manager, leading the international mission "Mars – The New Home." In their hands are the lives of Earth's brightest specialists.

When unforeseen events push the first Martian colony to the brink of disaster, carefully laid plans will crumble, and survival will become the main priority. To accomplish the mission despite all challenges, the player must develop technologies, explore unknown territories, and build life-supporting infrastructure, while Mars grudgingly offers resources but generously throws up obstacles. Every decision brings the colonists closer to either prosperity or catastrophe, with consequences often delayed in time.

The dangers aren’t only outside the base. Isolation, stress, and conflicts threaten to tear the team apart from within. We must not only meet the colonists' needs but also monitor their mental health, preventing hostility toward ourselves and outbreaks of madness.

MARSBOUND is about managing resources and people while balancing on the edge of disaster every day. Strategic thinking, composure, and courage are the player's steadfast allies on the path to victory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
